items.name: Alpaca
items.other_info: Nestled in soft, huggable fur, this adorable stuffed animal features big, round eyes that sparkle with innocence, capturing hearts at first glance.

items.name: Brown Lama
items.other_info: With a charming stitched smile and plush, cuddly body, this sweet stuffed animal is the perfect companion for cozy bedtime hugs and imaginative play.

items.name: Cow
items.other_info: Its fuzzy ears perk up inquisitively, adding an extra touch of charm to this endearing stuffed creature, making it irresistibly cute and delightful.

items.name: Goose
items.other_info: The gentle squishiness of its plush form invites tender squeezes, turning it into a cherished friend that brings warmth and comfort to all who embrace it.

items.name: Lama
items.other_info: Sporting a playful demeanor, this little stuffed buddy boasts a whimsical expression that invites joy and companionship, making it impossible to resist its charm.

items.name: Monkey
items.other_info: Adorned with a tiny bow and fuzzy paws, this lovable stuffed animal radiates sweetness, becoming a delightful confidant for both laughter-filled adventures and quiet moments of comfort.

items.name: Owl
items.other_info: Its petite size and soft, pastel-colored fur make this endearing plush creature a perfect snuggle buddy, bringing a touch of enchantment to every cuddle session.

items.name: Turkey
items.other_info: With a velvety touch and an enchanting expression, this lovable stuffed companion is a heartwarming reminder that even the smallest cuddles can bring immense joy.
